ygData.subject: Re: New Rules
ygData.msgSnippet: eGroups had been broken, but its fixed now. A flood of posts from anyone who sent any while it was broken should arrive anytime (keyword: should). ... must ...

eGroups had been broken, but its fixed now. A flood of posts from
anyone who sent any while it was broken should arrive anytime
(keyword: should).


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Every other day, not every day. However, in addition to that you
must
> have them interact heavily with characters of other RPGers.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> > So, I can still have those characters but I have to post for them
> every
> > SINGLE day?
> > 
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > Sent: Sunday, May 06, 2001 6:11 PM
> > Subject: New Rules
> > 
> > 
> > > The new rules, which the council has been working on for the
past
> five
> > > days, have been posted on the site (the rules section). The char
> > > regulations apply on the 12th (so you guys have 6 days to kill
off
> any
> > > additional chars you have). The other rules come in effect NOW.
> > > Everyone, go read the rules! We'll be hunting down and punishing
> > > violators like crazy, so be sure to follow them :-)
> > >
> > > All you peeps who were complainin' about the char limit, we made
a
> > > slight exception for you, though it's hard work. Anyways, check
it
> > > out, read carefully, and obey.
> > >
> > >
> > > PS. Anyone who is not planning to have more than 16 chars, this
> battle
> > > is a good opportunity to get a few of them killed.
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
> http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
> > >
> > >
